page.title: 07A Fisherman's Day
page.content: Mr.K Forman is a local fisherman who works on a{purser vessel}from a port in the{N.E. of Scotland.}Here is a example of a day in his life on board during a trip. He leaves{Fraserburgh harbour}at {midnight}and the crew take turns at watch and sleep until they reach the {fishing grounds}.They are hoping to catch Herring near the{Shetland {Islands}then they have breakfast.After breakfast{the net is shot}into the water{.After one hour the net is {hauled}the crew hope they have caught their{quota}.If they have they head for{Ullapool}to sell the fish to {Russian ships}called{Klondykers}where the fish is processed for{world wide {distribution}.Once the crew have {landed}the fish they go home to their families.
